#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long long s,n,i,cot[150],enjoy[150],space ,ma,a[150],j;

int main()
{
   while(1)
   {
   cin>>s>>n;
   memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
   ma = -1;
   if(s==0&&n==0)break;
   
   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
   {
   	  cin>>cot[i]>>enjoy[i];
   }
   
   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
   {
   	  for(j=s;j>=0;j--)
   	  {
   	  	 if(cot[i]<=j)
   	  	 {
   	  	 	a[j] = max(a[j],enjoy[i] + a[j-cot[i]]);
   	  	 }
   	  }
   	
   }

   for(j=0;j<s;j++)
   {
   	if(a[j]>ma){
   		ma = a[j];
   		space  = j;
   	}
   }
	
	cout<<space<<" "<<ma<<"\n";
   }
	return 0;
}
